00009 #pragma once
00010 
00011 #include <type_traits>
00012 
00013 template <typename ... Ts>
00014 struct unique_types;
00015 
00016 template <typename T1, typename T2, typename ... Ts>
00017 struct unique_types<T1, T2, Ts ...>
00018     : unique_types<T1, T2>, unique_types<T1, Ts ...>, unique_types<T2, Ts ...> {};
00019 
00020 template <typename T1, typename T2>
00021 struct unique_types<T1, T2> {
00022     static_assert(!std::is_same_v<T1, T2>, "Types must be unique.");
00023 };
